mapper.insert: insert into comic_orderview(orderview_num, orderview_category, orderview_product_num) values ((select max(orderview_num) from comic_orderview)+1, #{orderview_category}, #{orderview_product_num})
mapper.select: select * from COMIC_ORDERVIEW order by orderview_num
mapper.update: update comic_orderview set ORDERVIEW_CATEGORY = #{orderview_category} where ORDERVIEW_NUM = #{orderview_num}
mapper.select: select fk.PRODUCT_NAME, fk.PRODUCT_PRICE from COMIC_PRODUCTSTOCK fk, COMIC_ORDERVIEW_PRODUCT pk where fk.PRODUCT_NUM = pk.orderview_product_num AND pk.ORDERVIEW_CATEGORY = #{category}
select count(*) from comic_productstock where product_name = #{productName}
mapper.insert: insert into COMIC_ORDERVIEW_PRODUCT(ORDERVIEW_NUM, ORDERVIEW_CATEGORY, ORDERVIEW_PRODUCT_NUM) values ((select max(ORDERVIEW_NUM) from COMIC_ORDERVIEW_PRODUCT)+1,#{productCategory}, (select product_num from comic_productstock where product_name = #{productName}))
